about_the_game:
Terra Exodus is an experimental action strategy game by a solo developer looking to break some new ground in the genre. Make fast but important decisions to coordinate the robotic soldiers and hold each chokepoint as long as possible.

In the face of impossible odds, the people of Terra look to you for salvation. The Plethora onslaught is relentless, and the planet is on the brink of annihilation. Every citizen of Terra has dedicated the last 50 years to the Exodus Program, an escape plan of global proportions. As a commander in humanity's last stand, your mission is clear: Defend the cities, manage evacuations, and lead the final resistance. Will you rise to the challenge and guide Terra through its darkest hours?

Terra Exodus puts you in the command of a dropship visiting cities that are about to be overrun by the Plethora.  Each mission drops an cloned commander into a chokepoint with a small squadron of soldiers, and the you must hold the line on the streets, while maintaining a steady flow of supplies from the command center below.  VIPs with valuable knowledge can be specially extracted and each can provide a desperately needed technological edge to the evacuation efforts.

Every city on Terra will eventually fall though, its just a matter of time...

  • Take Control: Gameplay features a controller first approach to real time tactics. Balance the needs of the frontline bunker, with the production and operations capabilities of the commander center below!

  • Cloned Commanders: Take the role of the Heirs for their brief remainder of duty as they defend the chokepoint long enough to evacuate the city.

  • Hold the Line: Not every city can be reached, choose each destination carefully, balancing for population that can be rescued, and technology that will help the cause.

  • Better, Faster, Stronger: The Plethora invasion forces cannot be defeated, only delayed. Organize missions to evacuate Terra's VIPs that provide new weapons and battlefield options.

  • Lessons Learned: Unlock permanent strategic gambits that can tip the balance enough in your favor to evacuate the entire city in time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, Radeon RX 580 or Intel Arc A580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Defend the evacuation of Terra on the losing side of an alien invasion. This experimental action strategy game breaks out of genre norms to provide fresh mechanics to strategic gaming.
